steps.342: add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl
steps.343: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl
steps.344: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted)
steps.345: Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread
steps.346: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl
steps.347: add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl
steps.348: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl
steps.349: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides
steps.350: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves
steps.351: add-In a bowl, add the cut cherry tomatoes
steps.352: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate
